benchmark_config.jira_title: Implement/Test API: POST /1.0/kb/accounts/payments - Trigger a payment using the account external key

covered: Valid payload scenarios leading to HTTP 201 with required and optional parameters (TC01–TC06)
Error handling across a wide range of scenarios: 404, 400, 402, 422, 502, 503, 504 (TC07–TC16, TC18, TC24)
Boundary tests for payload size (TC21 TC22 TC23)
Dependent service integration and related errors (TC24)
gaps: 403 Forbidden authorization scenarios are not covered (only 401 in TC17)
Internal server error (500) scenario is not covered
Validation tests for currency codes and edge numeric ranges (e.g., negative/zero amounts) are not explicit
Explicit concurrency/race-condition tests beyond load/perf scenarios are not present
recommendations: Add a test for duplicate submissions to verify idempotency and proper handling of repeated POSTs
Add a 403 Forbidden authorization test to cover insufficient-permission scenarios
Introduce rate-limiting/throttling tests to ensure resilience under bursts
Add a 500 Internal Server Error scenario to validate handling of unexpected server/db failures
Extend validation tests to include currency code validity and numeric range checks (e.g., negative/zero amounts)
Add explicit concurrency/race-condition tests to verify behavior under simultaneous submissions
Consider edge-case tests for pluginProperty and cross-plugin interactions to ensure robustness
